text: Bradford Alexander Halsey (February 14, 1981 â€“ October 31, 2014) was am American Major League Baseball pitcher. He played for the New York Yankees, Arizona Diamondbacks and Oakland Athletics. Halsey died on October 31, 2014, near his home in New Braunfels, Texas, at the age of 33. According to the local judge who ordered the autopsy, Halsey's fatal injuries were caused by either a jump or a fall from a 100-foot cliff on private property. His body was discovered below, on a small road going up to the cliff. ==References== ==Other websites== *SF Chronicle article on surgery Category:1981 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:New York Yankees players Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Arizona Diamondbacks players Category:Sportspeople from Houston
title: Brad Halsey
